twoSetSkill.name: Timeless 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When there are 2 or less enemies on the field, team mates take 10.0% less Indirect DMG. This effect cannot stack.

threeSetSkill.name: Curtana 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: After exit, the team mates switching in gains 20% DEF for 10s.
